mapper.select: SELECT MASTER_DATA.MASTER_PROJECT AS PROJECT_CODE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MASTER_DATA.EAI_CREATE_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LATESTEAICREATEDATE, MASTER_DATA.EAI_CREATE_TIME AS MASTER_CREATE_TIME, OSPEC_DATA.EAI_CREATE_TIME AS OSPEC_CREATE_TIME, USSAGE_DATA.EAI_CREATE_TIME AS USSAGE_CREATE_TIME FROM ( SELECT TARGET_PROJECT AS MASTER_PROJECT, MAX (EAI_CREATE_TIME) AS EAI_CREATE_TIME FROM IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST GROUP BY TARGET_PROJECT ) MASTER_DATA, ( SELECT PROJECT_CODE AS OSPEC_PROJECT, MAX (EAI_CREATE_TIME) AS EAI_CREATE_TIME FROM IF_PREBOM_OSPEC_TRIM GROUP BY PROJECT_CODE ) OSPEC_DATA, ( SELECT PROJECT_CODE AS USSAGE_PROJECT, MAX (EAI_CREATE_TIME) AS EAI_CREATE_TIME FROM IF_PREBOM_USAGE_FULL GROUP BY PROJECT_CODE ) USSAGE_DATA WHERE MASTER_DATA.MASTER_PROJECT = OSPEC_DATA.OSPEC_PROJECT AND USSAGE_DATA.USSAGE_PROJECT = MASTER_DATA.MASTER_PROJECT

select distinct project_code AS PROJECT_CODE, area AS AREA, passenger AS PASSENGER, engine AS ENGINE, grade AS GRADE, trim AS TRIM, trim(area)||':'|| trim(passenger)||':'|| trim(engine)||':'|| trim(grade)||':'|| trim(trim) AS USSAGE_KEY, trim_seq AS TRIM_SEQ from if_prebom_ospec_trim where substr(eai_create_time, 0, 8) = substr(#{ospec_eai_create, jdbcType=VARCHAR},0,8) and project_code = #{project_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (stat is null or stat != 'D') order by trim_seq

IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.SYSTEM_NAME AS MAST_COL04 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.FUNCTION AS MAST_COL05 , TO_CHAR(IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.LEV_M, '9999') AS MAST_COL06 , TO_CHAR(IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.LEV, '9999') AS MAST_COL07 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.SEQ AS MAST_COL08 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.PARENT_NO AS MAST_COL09 , ( SELECT XPVIR.PS7_OLD_PART_NO FROM INFODBA.PITEMREVISION XR, INFODBA.PITEM XI, INFODBA.PS7_PREVEHPARTREVISION XPVIR WHERE XI.PITEM_ID = IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.CHILD_UNIQUE_NO AND XI.PUID = XR.RITEMS_TAGU AND XR.PUID = XPVIR.PUID AND XR.PITEM_REVISION_ID = IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.CHILD_REV ) AS MAST_COL10 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.CHILD_NO AS MAST_COL11 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.CHILD_NAME AS MAST_COL12 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.MANDATORY_OPT AS MAST_COL13 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.SPECIFICATION AS MAST_COL14 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.VC AS MAST_COL15 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.CHG_TYPE_ENGCONCEPT AS MAST_COL16 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.PROJECT AS MAST_COL17 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.IS_PROTO_TOOLING AS MAST_COL18 , TO_CHAR(NVL(IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.QTY, 1), '9999') AS MAST_COL19 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.SMODE AS MAST_COL20 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.EST_WEIGHT AS MAST_COL21 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.TGT_WEIGHT AS MAST_COL22 --20201228 전성용 S7_Weight_Management column 추가 및 이후 col 번호 1씩 증가시킴.. 55까지.. , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.WEIGHT_MANAGEMENT AS MAST_COL23 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.MODULE AS MAST_COL24 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.ALTER_PART AS MAST_COL25 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.REGULATION AS MAST_COL26 --20201020 seho EJS column 추가 및 이후 col 번호 1씩 증가시킴.. 54까지.. , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.EJS AS MAST_COL27 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.BOX AS MAST_COL28 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.CHANGE_DESC AS MAST_COL29 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.EST_COST_MATERIAL AS MAST_COL30 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.TGT_COST_MATERIAL AS MAST_COL31 , TO_CHAR(IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.DVP_NEEDED_QTY, '9999') AS MAST_COL32 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.DVP_USE AS MAST_COL33 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.DVP_REQ_DEPT AS MAST_COL34 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.CON_DWG_PERFORMANCE AS MAST_COL35 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.CON_DWG_PLAN AS MAST_COL36 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.CON_DWG_TYPE AS MAST_COL37 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.RELEASED_DATE AS MAST_COL38 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.PRD_DWG_PERFORMANCE AS MAST_COL39 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.PRD_DWG_PLAN AS MAST_COL40 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.ECO AS MAST_COL41 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.OSPEC_NO AS MAST_COL42 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.DC_ID AS MAST_COL43 , to_char(to_date(IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.RELEASED_DATE,'yyyymmddHH24MISS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MAST_COL44 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.ENG_DEPT_NM AS MAST_COL45 , DESIGN_USER.USER_NAME AS MAST_COL46 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.SELECTED_COMPANY AS MAST_COL47 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.PRT_TOOLG_INVESTMENT AS MAST_COL48 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.PRD_TOOL_COST AS MAST_COL49 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.PRD_SERVICE_COST AS MAST_COL50 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.PRD_SAMPLE_COST AS MAST_COL51 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.PRD_TOTAL AS MAST_COL52 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.PUR_TEAM AS MAST_COL53 , PROD_USER.USER_NAME AS MAST_COL54 , (select to_char(LISTAGG(ei.pitem_id), ',') from infodba.pitem ei , infodba.pitem pi , infodba.pworkspaceobject eiw , infodba.pworkspaceobject piw , infodba.pimanrelation rell , infodba.pimantype ty where ei.puid = eiw.puid and pi.puid = piw.puid and eiw.pobject_type = 'S7_Vehpart' and piw.pobject_type = 'S7_PreVehPart' and ei.puid = rell.rprimary_objectu and pi.puid = rell.rsecondary_objectu and rell.rrelation_typeu = ty.puid and ty.PTYPE_NAME = 'S7_ASSIGNED_PART_REL' and pi.pitem_id = IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.CHILD_UNIQUE_NO) as MAST_COL55 , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.LIST_ID AS LIST_ID , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.SYSTEM_ROW_KEY AS SYSTEM_ROW_KEY , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.PARENT_UNIQUE_NO AS PARENT_UNIQUE_NO , IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.SORT_ORDER AS SORT_ORDER FROM IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST , ( SELECT PPERSON.PUSER_NAME AS USER_NAME , PPOM_USER.PUSER_ID AS USER_ID FROM INFODBA.PUSER, INFODBA.PPERSON , INFODBA.PPOM_USER WHERE PUSER.RPERSONU = PPERSON.PUID AND PPOM_USER.PUID = PUSER.PUID ) DESIGN_USER , ( SELECT PPERSON.PUSER_NAME AS USER_NAME , PPOM_USER.PUSER_ID AS USER_ID FROM INFODBA.PUSER , INFODBA.PPERSON , INFODBA.PPOM_USER WHERE PUSER.RPERSONU = PPERSON.PUID AND PPOM_USER.PUID = PUSER.PUID ) PROD_USER WHERE IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.TARGET_PROJECT=#{project_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.EAI_CREATE_TIME like SUBSTR(#{master_eai_create, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, 8) || '%' AND IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.ENG_RESPONSIBLITY = DESIGN_USER.USER_ID(+) AND IF_PREBOM_MASTER_FULL_LIST.PUR_RESPONSIBILITY = PROD_USER.USER_ID(+) ORDER BY SORT_ORDER ) select * from bomlist start with parent_unique_no like 'M%' connect by prior MAST_COL01 = PARENT_UNIQUE_NO order siblings by sort_order

SELECT SYSTEM_ROW_KEY, AREA, PASSENGER, ENGINE, GRADE, TRIM, USAGE_QTY, USAGE_TYPE, CASE USAGE_TYPE WHEN 'STD' THEN ''||USAGE_QTY||'' ELSE '('||USAGE_QTY||')' END AS Q_VALUE, TRIM(AREA)||':'|| TRIM(PASSENGER)||':'|| TRIM(ENGINE)||':'|| TRIM(GRADE)||':'|| TRIM(TRIM) AS USSAGE_KEY FROM IF_PREBOM_USAGE_FULL WHERE PROJECT_CODE = #{project_code, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SUBSTR(EAI_CREATE_TIME, 0, 8)= SUBSTR(#{ussage_create_time, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, 8) AND SYSTEM_ROW_KEY = #{systemRowKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY USSAGE_KEY
